titles.title: Jay S. Hammond Wilderness Act of 2017
Jay S. Hammond Wilderness Act of 2017
Jay S. Hammond Wilderness Act of 2017
Jay S. Hammond Wilderness Act of 2017
A bill to designate the wilderness within the Lake Clark National Park and Preserve in the State of Alaska as the Jay S. Hammond Wilderness Area.
Jay S. Hammond Wilderness Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 115-108.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 145.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)
Jay S. Hammond Wilderness Act of 2017
(Sec. 2) This bill designates approximately 2.6 million acres of National Wilderness Preservation System land in the Lake Clark National Park and Preserve in Alaska as the "Jay S. Hammond Wilderness Area."
